testcase.name: Add a new Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And The user has to fill email "admin@yourstore.com" and password "admin"...passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboad.................................................passed When User click on customers Menu...........................................passed And Click on customers Menu Item............................................passed And Click on Add new button.................................................passed Then User can view Add new customer page....................................passed When User enter customer info...............................................passed And Click on Save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "The new customer has been addedÂ successfully.".passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
